重.definition: heavy; serious; to attach importance to

重中之重.definition: of the utmost importance; of highest priority

重九.definition: the Double Ninth Festival (9th day of the 9th lunar month)

重五.definition: Dragon Boat Festival (5th day of 5th lunar month)

重來.definition: to start over; to do sth all over again

重修.definition: to reconstruct; to repair; to revamp; to revise; to retake a failed course

重修舊好.definition: to make friends again; to renew old cordial relations

重光.definition: to recover one's sight; (fig.) to recover (lost territories)

重出江湖.definition: (of a person) to return to the fray after a period of inactivity; to jump back into the thick of things; (of sth that was once popular) to be resurrected; to make a comeback

重利.definition: high interest; huge profit; to value money highly

重利輕義.definition: to value material gain over righteousness

重創.definition: to inflict heavy losses; to inflict serious damage

重午.definition: Dragon Boat Festival (5th day of 5th lunar month)

重卡.definition: heavy truck (abbr. for 重型卡車|重型卡车)

重口味.definition: strong flavor (spicy, salty etc); (of food) strongly flavored; (of a person) having a preference for strong flavors; (slang) intense; hardcore

重啟.definition: to restart (a machine etc); to reactivate (a postponed project etc)

重地.definition: location of political, economic, military, or cultural importance (usu. not open to the general public); sensitive area

重塑.definition: to reconstruct (an art object); to remodel

重壓.definition: high pressure; bearing a heavy weight

重奏.definition: musical ensemble of several instruments (e.g. duet 二重奏 or trio 三重奏)

重審.definition: to reinvestigate; to investigate and reconsider a judgment

重屋.definition: lit. multiple roof; building of several stories

重建.definition: to rebuild; to reestablish; reconstruction; rebuilding

重形式輕內容.pinyin: zhòng xíng shì qīng nèi róng
重形式輕內容.definition: heavy on form, light on substance; to stress form at the expense of content

重影.definition: overlapping images; double exposure of photo (e.g. due to fault or motion of camera); double vision

重心.definition: center of gravity; central core; main part

重披戰袍.definition: (fig.) to re-enter the fray; to return to a field of activity after a period of absence

重拾.definition: to pick up (a theme etc); to regain (confidence); to revive (a custom, friendship etc)

重挫.definition: devastating setback; slump (in stock market etc); crushing defeat; to cause a serious setback; to plummet

重振.definition: to revitalize; to restore (prestige, prosperity etc); revival; recovery

重提舊事.definition: to raise the same old topic again; to hark back

重插.definition: to replug; to disconnect and reconnect (from a plug, port, connection etc)

重播.definition: to replay; to rerun; (agriculture) to reseed; to oversow

重擔.definition: heavy burden; difficult task; great responsibility

重整.definition: to restructure; to reorganize; to revamp

重整奧思定會.pinyin: zhòng zhěng ào sī dìng huì
重整奧思定會.definition: Order of Augustinian Recollects, a mendicant Catholic religious order of friars and nuns

重整旗鼓.definition: lit. to reorganize flags and drums (idiom); to regroup after a setback; to prepare for new initiatives; to attempt a comeback

重文.definition: repetitious passage; multiple variants of Chinese characters

重文輕武.definition: to value letters and belittle arms (idiom); to stress civil matters and neglect the military; to prefer the pen to the sword

重新做人.definition: to start a new life; to make a fresh start

重新開始.definition: to resume; to restart; to start afresh

重於泰山.definition: heavier than Mt Tai (idiom); fig. extremely serious matter

重機關槍.definition: also written 重機槍|重机枪; heavy machine gun

重歷舊遊.definition: to revisit; to return to a previously visited spot

重活兒.definition: erhua variant of 重活[zhong4 huo2]

重溫.definition: to learn sth over again; to review; to brush up; to revive (memories, friendship etc)

重溫舊夢.definition: to revive old dreams (idiom); to relive past experiences

重演.definition: to recur (of events, esp. adverse ones); to repeat (a performance)

重災區.definition: area particularly hard-hit by a disaster; disaster area

重現江湖.definition: see 重出江湖[chong2 chu1 jiang1 hu2]

重用.definition: to put in an important position

重男輕女.definition: to value males and attach less importance to females (idiom)

重疊.definition: to overlap; to superimpose; to telescope; to run together; to duplicate; one over another; superposition; an overlap; redundancy; reduplication (in Chinese grammar, e.g. 散散步[san4 san4 bu4] to have a stroll)

重眼皮.definition: double eyelid; epicanthal fold of upper eyelid (characteristic of Asian people)

重眼皮兒.definition: double eyelid; epicanthal fold of upper eyelid (characteristic of Asian people)

重睹天日.definition: to see the light again (idiom); delivered from oppression

重碼.definition: repeated code; coincident code (i.e. two characters or words having the same encoding)

重磅.definition: (of a bomb) powerful; (of news) impactful; significant; (of fabric) heavy-duty

重磅炸彈.definition: (fig.) sth that produces shockwaves; bombshell (revelation); blockbuster (product)

重組.definition: to reorganize; to recombine; to restructure

重繭.definition: thick callus; (literary) thick silkwaste padded clothes

重義輕利.definition: to value righteousness rather than material gain (idiom)

重者.definition: more serious case; in extreme cases

重聯.definition: (physics) magnetic reconnection; (railways) double heading (using two locomotives at the front of a train)

重臂.definition: actuator (arm of a lever); lever; actuating arm

重臣.definition: important minister; major figure in government

重色輕友.definition: paying more attention to a lover than friends (idiom); to value sex over friendship

重製.definition: to make a copy; to reproduce; to remake (a movie)

重複.definition: to repeat; to duplicate; CL:個|个[ge4]

重複使力傷害.pinyin: zhòng fù shǐ lì shāng hài

重覆.definition: variant of 重複|重复[chong2 fu4]

重見天日.definition: to see the light again (idiom); delivered from oppression

重視.definition: to attach importance to sth; to value

重訓.definition: (Tw) weight training (abbr. for 重量訓練|重量训练[zhong4 liang4 xun4 lian4])

重譯.definition: to translate again (i.e. to redo the same translation); to translate repeatedly from one language to the next (so multiplying errors)

重負.definition: heavy load; heavy burden (also fig. of tax)

重足而立.definition: rooted to the spot (idiom); too terrified to move

重蹈.definition: (fig.) to follow (a path that has proved ill-advised)

重蹈覆轍.definition: lit. to follow in the tracks of an overturned cart (idiom); fig. to follow a path that led to failure in the past; to repeat a disastrous mistake

重農.definition: to stress the importance of agriculture (in ancient philosophy)

重迭.definition: variant of 重疊|重叠[chong2 die2]

重述.definition: to repeat; to restate; to recapitulate

重逢.definition: to meet again; to be reunited; reunion

重量級.definition: (sports) heavyweight class; (fig.) important; major; prominent; influential

重鎮.definition: (military) strategic town; (fig.) major center (for commerce, culture or tourism etc)

重陽.definition: Double Ninth or Yang Festival; 9th day of 9th lunar month

重陽節.definition: Double Ninth or Yang Festival; 9th day of 9th lunar month

重音.definition: accent (of a word); stress (on a syllable)

重頭.definition: main; most important; essential; important part

重頭戲.definition: opera (or role) involving much singing and action; (fig.) highlight; main feature; major activity

重黎.definition: Chongli, another name for Zhurong 祝融[Zhu4 rong2], god of fire

重點.definition: important point; main point; focus; key (project etc); to focus on; to put the emphasis on
